inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

in plate below image in black:[Painted by Vandyke/ Henry  Van Balen/ Engraved by John T. Wedgwood/ London Pub. for the Proprietor December 1821/ Proof]; on sheet in pencil: [1-70]
title: Portrait of Henry van Balen
